Package Controller

Class RestaurantController

java.lang.Object
Controller.RestaurantController
public class RestaurantController extends Object
An intermediatory controller that calls respective controllers to perform actions. Acts as a bridge to other controllers, by passing messages to the appropriate controller. Performs some data cleaning.
Since:
10 October 2021

      Parameters:
      promoId - , the promotion id which is used to search for a specific promotion
      itemParams - , the item's parameters in the order, id; name; description and price in string array

      Returns:
      true or false based on success/error

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • createOrder

      public void createOrder(int tableId, int cust_id, int staff_id, Date date)
      Creates a new order for this table and customer.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table that has the customer is allocated to.
      staffID - The ID of the staff who will be in charged for this order.
      date - The time date when this order is created.

    • addToOrder

      public String addToOrder(int tableId, int itemId, int quantity)
      Adds a quantity of Item objects to the order of the table tableId.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table that has the order needs to be processed.
      item - The Item object to be added.
      quantity - The number of Item objects to be added.
      Returns:
      "promo" if a quantity of Promotion objects is added successfully,
      or "item" if a quantity of Item objects is added successfully,
      or "false" if this is not a valid ID for any Item or Promotion.

    • removeFromOrder

      public int removeFromOrder(int tableId, int itemId, int quantity)
      Removes a quantity of Item objects from the order of the table tableId.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table that has the order needs to be processed.
      item - The Item object to be removed.
      quantity - The number of Item objects to be removed.
      Returns:
      2 if a quantity of item is removed from the order,
      or 1 if all the occurrences of this item are removed from the order,
      or 0 if cannot remove because there is no occurrence of this item in the order.

    • printOrder

      public void printOrder(int tableId, boolean withPrice)
      Prints the current status of the order of table tableId.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table that has the order needs to be printed.
      withPrice - true to print the order's price when the customer checks out, false otherwise.

    • printInvoice

      public void printInvoice(int tableId)
      Prints the final invoice of the table tableId when the customer wants to check out.
      Clears the table tableId by setting it to unoccupied and removing the current order.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table that has the order needs to be printed

    • findValidTable

      public int findValidTable(String[] details) throws ParseException
      Returns a valid table id to walk in dining or make reservation (based on the restaurant's policy):
      • For 1 or 2 pax: Only allocates tables of 2 or 4 seats.
      • For 3 or 4 pax: Only allocates tables of 4 or 6 seats.
      • For 5 or 6 pax: Only allocates tables of 6 or 8 seats.
      • For 7 or 8 pax: Only allocates tables of 8 or 10 seats.
      • For 9 or 10 pax: Only allocates tables of 10 seats.
      Parameters:
      details - A string array (customer id, timestamp, number of pax).
      Returns:
      The tableId of a valid table, -1 if it cannot find any.
      Throws:
      ParseException

    • isTableOccupied

      public boolean isTableOccupied(int tableId)
      Return true if this table is occupied.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table that is needed to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if this table is occupied, false otherwise.

    • printUnavailableTables

      public boolean printUnavailableTables()
      Prints all of the occupied tables.
      Returns:
      true if there is at least 1 occupied table, false otherwise.

    • printAvailableTables

      public boolean printAvailableTables()
      Prints all of the unoccupied tables.
      Returns:
      true if there is at least 1 unoccupied table, false otherwise.

    • printAvailableTables

      public void printAvailableTables(int noPax)
      Prints all of the unoccupied tables that has number of seats >= noPax.
      Parameters:
      noPax - The number of pax.

    • checkReservation

      public boolean checkReservation(String res_id)
      Returns true if this reservation ID is valid.
      Parameters:
      res_id - The reservation ID that is needed to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if this reservation ID valid

    • printCustomers

      public void printCustomers()
      Prints the information of all of the registered customers.

    • registerCustomer

      public int registerCustomer(String cust_name, int contactNo)
      Returns the new customer ID when he/she register one.
      Parameters:
      cust_name - The name of this customer who wishes to register.
      contactNo - The contact number of this customer who wishes to register.
      Returns:
      The new customer ID for this customer who wishes to register.

    • reserveTable

      public String reserveTable(String[] details)
      Returns the ID of the new reservation if it is made successfully.
      Parameters:
      details - A details string array to make new reservation (customer ID, timestamp, number of pax).
      Returns:
      The ID of reservation if it is allocated successfully,
      or "false 1" if there is no available table to reserve,
      or "false 2" if the time date of this reservation is in the past.

    • removeReservation

      public boolean removeReservation(String res_id)
      Return true if the reservation of this ID is removed successfully.
      Parameters:
      res_id - The ID of the reservation that is needed to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if this reservation is removed succesfully, false otherwise.

    • updateReservation

      public String updateReservation(String res_id, String datetime)
      Updates a reservation with a new date time.
      Parameters:
      res_id - The ID of the reservation that is needed to be updated.
      dateTime - The new date time to update.
      Returns:
      The new reservation id or "false" if the update cannot be made.

    • updateReservation

      public String updateReservation(String res_id, int noPax)
      Updates a reservation with a new number of pax.
      Parameters:
      res_id - The ID of the reservation that is needed to be updated.
      noPax - The new number of pax.
      Returns:
      The new reservation id or "false" if the update cannot be made.

    • printReservations

      public void printReservations(int tableId)
      Prints all of the reservations that are reserved with table tableId.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The id of table that is needed to find the resevations.

    • updateRestaurantDatabase

      public void updateRestaurantDatabase()
      Updates the database files of the restaurant when the app is closed.

    • printSalesReport

      public void printSalesReport(boolean byMonth, String timeNow)
      Parameters:
      byMonth - Determines whether print monthly or daily report
      timeNow - Current time as a string
